title: Ep. 612 - The Petty Tyrants That Rule Us
description:
Today on the Matt Walsh Show, an official in California votes to ban outdoor dining and then immediately goes to eat at a restaurant outdoors. We have gotten used to this hypocrisy from our rulers, but we should not be used to it. Also Five Headlines including controversy over a restaurant owner who scolded his patrons for twerking in his restaurant. People are offended that he told them to stop twerking. But reasonable people are more so concerned that he had to tell them in the first place. And in our Daily Cancellation, as we get into the holiday season, I will be canceling Christmas trees.
If you like The Matt Walsh Show, become a member TODAY with promo code: WALSH and enjoy the exclusive benefits for 10% off at https://www.dailywire.com/walsh
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
